snippet: A day after the shows "Girls" and "Veep" get their first run on HBO, the premiere episodes will be made available online in hopes of attracting nonsubscribers to the channel.
abstract: A day after the shows "Girls" and "Veep" get their first run on HBO, the premiere episodes will be made available online in hopes of attracting nonsubscribers to the channel.

headline.main: HBO Plans to Offer Free Access to a Pair of Comedies
